entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 8.
